meanings.def: a person who is not a member of the armed forces or the police
examples: Two soldiers and one civilian were killed in the explosion.
Hundreds of innocent civilians have died in the air strikes.
Further measures are needed to protect civilians.
The group was accused of targeting civilians.

meanings.def: connected with people who are not members of the armed forces or the police
examples: He left the army and returned to civilian life.
The bombs resulted in large numbers of civilian casualties.
He condemned the attacks on civilian targets.
